name: io.github.JuanCF/scrcpy-mcp
description: MCP server for Android device control via ADB and scrcpy

environmentVariables.name: ANDROID_SERIAL
environmentVariables.description: Target device serial number (from `adb devices`). Required when multiple devices are connected.

environmentVariables.name: ADB_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Custom path to the adb binary. Defaults to 'adb' on PATH.

environmentVariables.name: SCRCPY_SERVER_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to the scrcpy-server.jar file. Only needed if not installed in a standard location.
